    • Method Detail

      • ActiveLicense

        public static Boolean ActiveLicense(int type, String^ company, String^ email, String^ serial )
        Activate Radaee PDF library with SN and binded sompany name and email address
        Parameters:
        type - Type of the library which need to be activated. 0: Standard license; 1: Professional license 2: Premium license
        company - Company name which was used to register on Radaee offical site and bind with your license
        email - E-mail address which was used to register on Radaee offical site and bind with your license
        serial - Your serial number
         
        Returns:
        True if successed, otherwise false
